verifyEmail.verifyingDescription: Please wait while we verify your email address
verifyEmail.successMessage: Your email has been verified successfully!
verifyEmail.errorMessage: Failed to verify email. The link may be invalid or expired.

oauthCallback.signingInDescription: Please wait while we complete your sign-in.
oauthCallback.invalidState: Invalid authentication state. Please try again.
oauthCallback.accountExists: An account with this email already exists with a different provider.
oauthCallback.accessDenied: Access was denied. Please try again.
oauthCallback.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.

verification.sentLink: We sent a verification link to {email}. Check your inbox and click the link to verify your account.
verification.sent: Verification email sent! Please check your inbox.
verification.failed: Failed to send email. Please try again.

hero.title: Stop Wasting Time Hunting for Leads.
hero.subtitle: Get instant access to 82,740+ verified local businesses across 20 industries in 184 countries. Names, phones, emails, addresses — all ready to download.
hero.subtext: Other lead providers charge $0.50-$2.00 per lead. We start at $0.035. Do the math.

problem.title: Finding Quality Leads Shouldn't Be This Hard
problem.subtitle: If you're still doing any of these, you're leaving money on the table.

manual.title: Googling one business at a time
manual.desc: Spending hours copying names and numbers from Google Maps. Time you'll never get back.

expensive.title: Overpaying for lead databases
expensive.desc: Most providers charge $0.50-$2.00 per lead. For 500 leads, that's $250-$1,000. Every single month.

outdated.title: Working with stale, outdated data
outdated.desc: Bought a list last year? Half those businesses have changed their phone numbers or closed.

generic.title: Using generic business directories
generic.desc: Yellow Pages won't tell you which tattoo studios have Instagram or which gyms have websites.

solution.title: One Platform. Every Lead You Need.
solution.subtitle: IndustryDB gives you verified, industry-specific business data at a fraction of the cost. Search, filter, export. Done.

targeted.title: Industry-Specific
targeted.desc: Not a generic directory. Purpose-built data for 20 industries — from tattoo studios to law firms.

verified.title: Verified & Updated
verified.desc: Every lead is verified with real addresses, phone numbers, and business details you can trust.

instant.title: Instant Export
instant.desc: Search, filter by country and city, and export to CSV in seconds. No waiting, no sales calls.

value.title: Here's Everything You Get
value.subtitle: Every plan includes access to our full database with all these data points.

industries.title: 20 Industries. One Platform.
industries.subtitle: Whether you sell to restaurants or recruit for law firms, we have the data you need.

comparison.title: IndustryDB vs. The Competition
comparison.subtitle: See why businesses switch to IndustryDB after trying traditional lead providers.

others.title: Traditional Lead Providers
others.data: Generic, unverified data with high bounce rates
others.contracts: Annual contracts and long-term commitments required

us.title: The IndustryDB Way
us.price: Starting at $0.035 per lead. 500 leads = just $49/month
us.data: Verified data with addresses, phones, emails, and quality scores
us.contracts: No contracts. Cancel anytime. Start with a free plan.
us.industries: 20 specialized industries with targeted filters and sub-niches

pricing.title: Invest Less. Get More Leads.
pricing.subtitle: Every plan pays for itself with just one new client.

landing.freeLeadsNote: Start free. 50 leads/month. No credit card required.

guarantee.title: Zero Risk. Cancel Anytime.
guarantee.desc: Start with our free plan — no credit card needed. Upgrade only when you're ready. No contracts, no commitments, no hidden fees. If it doesn't work for you, you don't pay.

cta.title: Your Next 50 Leads Are Free.
cta.subtitle: Stop guessing. Start closing. Get verified business data in 30 seconds.

features.title: Everything you need to find quality leads

verified.title: Verified Data
verified.description: All business information is verified and regularly updated

affordable.title: Affordable Pricing
affordable.description: Plans starting at just $49/month with flexible options

easy.title: Easy to Use
easy.description: Search, filter, and export leads in minutes

instantAccess.title: Instant Access
instantAccess.description: Search and export data instantly. No waiting, no delays

industryFocus.title: Industry Focus
industryFocus.description: Specialized data for tattoo, beauty, fitness, and hospitality industries

stats.countriesList: US, GB, DE, ES, FR, CA, AU

preview.selectCountry: Select a country to preview results

emptyState.title: No leads found

searchState.step2Desc: Each search uses 1 credit from your monthly allowance
searchState.step3Desc: View results, paginate freely, and export without extra charges

search.upgradeToSearch: Upgrade your plan to continue searching

creditDialog.title: Confirm Search
creditDialog.useOneCredit: This search will use 1 credit from your monthly allowance.
creditDialog.runningLowDesc: You'll have only {count} searches left after this one. Consider upgrading your plan to avoid interruptions.
creditDialog.lastSearchDesc: This is your last available search for this month. You'll need to upgrade or wait until {date} for more credits.
creditDialog.upgradeDesc: Upgrade to Starter for 500 searches/month or Pro for 2,000 searches/month.
creditDialog.note: Pagination and export don't consume additional credits. Only new searches do.

exports.processingMsg: Your export is being processed. This usually takes 1-2 minutes.

billing.freePlanMsg: You are on the Free plan. Upgrade below to access more features.

privacy.title: Privacy & Data
privacy.description: Manage your personal data and privacy settings

export.title: GDPR Data Export
export.description: Download all your personal data in JSON format. This includes your profile, usage history, subscription details, and export history.

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Account
deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account, cancel your subscription, and remove all your data from our servers.

toast.exportSuccessDesc: Your personal data has been downloaded successfully
toast.deletionSuccessDesc: Your account has been deleted successfully
toast.passwordRequiredDesc: Please enter your password to confirm account deletion

analytics.subtitle: Track your platform usage and activity

charts.dailyUsageDesc: Searches and exports over the last {days} days

table.title: Detailed Daily Breakdown

noData.title: No Usage Data

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.subtitle: Manage your API keys for programmatic access to IndustryDB

upgrade.title: API Keys
upgrade.description: API keys are available exclusively on the Business tier
upgrade.upgradeDescription: Get programmatic access to IndustryDB with API keys on our Business plan

list.emptyDescription: Create your first API key to start accessing IndustryDB programmatically

create.title: Create API Key
create.description: Create a new API key for programmatic access to IndustryDB
create.warningMessage: The API key will only be shown once. Make sure to copy and store it securely.

created.title: API Key Created Successfully
created.description: Copy your API key now. This is the only time it will be displayed.
created.label: API Key
created.warningMessage: Store this API key securely. You won't be able to see it again.

revoke.title: Revoke API Key?
revoke.description: This will immediately invalidate the API key "{name}". Any applications using this key will lose access. This action cannot be undone.

delete.title: Delete API Key?
delete.description: This will permanently delete the API key "{name}" and all its usage history. This action cannot be undone.

toast.nameRequiredDesc: Please enter a name for the API key

savedSearches.title: My Saved Searches
savedSearches.subtitle: Quickly access and re-run your frequently used searches

empty.title: No Saved Searches
empty.description: Save your searches for quick access later

delete.title: Delete Saved Search?
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your saved search.

cookieConsent.title: We use cookies
cookieConsent.message: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.
cookieConsent.learnMore: Learn more in our Privacy Policy
